title: Smartphone-Based Technology-Enhanced Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language skills and fundamental proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Smartphone-optimized content delivery for efficient learning design in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three basic design frameworks for technology-enhanced learning in mobile environments
Learners can directly design at least two LMS-based activities for language learning in limited-technology environments
Learners can improve their own learning designs at least once by reflecting on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
